name: Slime vs Zombies (Coming Soon)
description:
Slime vs Zombies

Survival game, where you have to survive for 4 days in a city inhabited by zombies.

Disaster came when a zombie virus attacked our town "Slimes City" and we couldn't find a way to fight the virus and ended up like this only I can survive.

You can buy items to survive, the longer you last the stronger and formidable zombies that come. Survive up to 4 days and you will get the Final Ending of this game.

*This game is still under development. If it's released, we'll let you know,We hope that you will give us good feedback when the game is released, Thank you :)

Our Social Media:
